trans-unit.source: Provides an object representation of a uniform resource identifier (URI) and easy access to the parts of the URI.
trans-unit.target: 提供統一資源識別元 (URI) 的物件表示，以及對 URI 各部分的簡易存取。

trans-unit.source: A URI is a compact representation of a resource available to your application on the intranet or Internet.
trans-unit.target: URI 是資源的以精簡方式的內部網路或網際網路上的應用程式可以使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> class defines the properties and methods for handling URIs, including parsing, comparing, and combining.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri>類別定義的屬性和方法來處理包括剖析、 比較和結合的 Uri。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> class properties are read-only; to create a modifiable object, use the <xref:System.UriBuilder> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri>類別屬性是唯讀; 若要建立可修改的物件，使用<xref:System.UriBuilder>類別。

trans-unit.source: Relative URIs (for example, "/new/index.htm") must be expanded with respect to a base URI so that they are absolute.
trans-unit.target: 相對 Uri (例如，"/ new/index.htm")，使其絕對必須展開相對於基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.MakeRelative%2A> method is provided to convert absolute URIs to relative URIs when necessary.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.MakeRelative%2A>方法提供來相對 Uri，在必要時轉換成絕對 Uri。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> constructors do not escape URI strings if the string is a well-formed URI including a scheme identifier.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri>建構函式不逸出 URI 字串的字串是否格式正確的 URI，包括配置識別項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> properties return a canonical data representation in escaped encoding, with all characters with Unicode values greater than 127 replaced with their hexadecimal equivalents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri>屬性傳回的標準資料表示法中逸出的編碼，所有字元都使用 Unicode 值大於 127 取代成其十六進位對等用法。

trans-unit.source: To put the URI in canonical form, the <xref:System.Uri> constructor performs the following steps:
trans-unit.target: 若要以標準形式，放入 URI<xref:System.Uri>建構函式會執行下列步驟：

trans-unit.source: Converts the URI scheme to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 轉換為小寫的 URI 配置。

trans-unit.source: Converts the host name to lowercase.
trans-unit.target: 將主機名稱轉換成小寫。

trans-unit.source: If the host name is an IPv6 address, the canonical IPv6 address is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果主機名稱是 IPv6 位址，則會使用標準的 IPv6 位址。

trans-unit.source: ScopeId and other optional IPv6 data are removed.
trans-unit.target: ScopeId 和其他選擇性 IPv6 資料都會移除。

trans-unit.source: Removes default and empty port numbers.
trans-unit.target: 移除預設值和空白的連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: Escaped characters (also known as percent-encoded octets) that don't have a reserved purpose are decoded (also known as being unescaped).
trans-unit.target: 逸出的字元 （也稱為百分比編碼八位元組） 不需要保留的目的解碼 （也稱為正在未逸出方式）。

trans-unit.source: These unreserved characters include uppercase and lowercase letters (%41-%5A and %61-%7A), decimal digits (%30-%39), hyphen (%2D), period (%2E), underscore (%5F), and tilde (%7E).
trans-unit.target: 這些非保留的字元包括大寫和小寫字母 (%41-%5a 和 %61-%7a)、 小數位數 （%30-%39)、 連字號 (%2d)、 句號 (%2e) (%5f) 底線加上波狀符號 (%7e)。

trans-unit.source: Canonicalizes the path for hierarchical URIs by compacting sequences such as /./, /../, and // (whether or not the sequence is escaped).
trans-unit.target: Canonicalizes 路徑的階層式 Uri 以壓縮序列例如 /。，/.../，，/ / （不論是否序列逸出）。

trans-unit.source: Note that there are some schemes for which these sequences are not compacted.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，某些配置中，這些序列則不會壓縮。

trans-unit.source: For hierarchical URIs, if the host is not terminated with a forward slash (/), one is added.
trans-unit.target: 階層式的 uri，如果主機不終止以正斜線 （/），會新增一個。

trans-unit.source: By default, any reserved characters in the URI are escaped in accordance with RFC 2396.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，在 URI 中的任何保留的字元會根據 RFC 2396 逸出。

trans-unit.source: This behavior changes if International Resource Identifiers or International Domain Name parsing is enabled in which case reserved characters in the URI are escaped in accordance with RFC 3986 and RFC 3987.
trans-unit.target: 此行為變更如果啟用國際資源識別項或國際網域名稱解析在 URI 中的大小寫保留字元會逸出根據 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987。

trans-unit.source: As part of canonicalization in the constructor for some schemes, dot-segments and empty segments (/./, /../, and //) are compacted (in other words, they are removed).
trans-unit.target: 標準化，在某些配置、 點區段和空的區段的建構函式的一部分 (/。，/.../，，/ /) 壓縮的 （也就是說，它們已移除）。

trans-unit.source: The schemes for which URI will compact these sequences include http, https, tcp, net.pipe, and net.tcp.
trans-unit.target: 配置的 URI 會壓縮這些順序包括 http、 https、 tcp、 net.pipe 和 net.tcp。

trans-unit.source: For some other schemes, these sequences are not compacted.
trans-unit.target: 對於其他配置，這些序列則不會壓縮。

trans-unit.source: Here's how this compacting looks in practice.
trans-unit.target: 以下是此壓縮的外觀中練習。

trans-unit.source: When this code is executed, it returns the following output, with the escaped sequences unescaped if necessary and then compacted.
trans-unit.target: 執行此程式碼時，它會傳回下列輸出中，與未逸出方式如有必要，再壓縮的逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: You can transform the contents of the <xref:System.Uri> class from an escape encoded URI reference to a readable URI reference by using the <xref:System.Uri.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將轉換的內容<xref:System.Uri>類別從 可讀取的 URI 參考使用的編碼的逸出 URI 參考<xref:System.Uri.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Note that some reserved characters might still be escaped in the output of the <xref:System.Uri.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，某些保留的字元可能仍在輸出中逸出<xref:System.Uri.ToString%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This is to support unambiguous reconstruction of a URI from the value returned by <xref:System.Uri.ToString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這是為了支援的 URI，以從傳回的值模稜兩可重建<xref:System.Uri.ToString%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Some URIs include a fragment identifier or a query or both.
trans-unit.target: 一些 Uri 包含片段識別項、 查詢或兩者。

trans-unit.source: A fragment identifier is any text that follows a number sign (#), not including the number sign; the fragment text is stored in the <xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 片段識別項是任何文字後面的數字符號 （#），不包括數字的符號;片段文字儲存在<xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Query information is any text that follows a question mark (?) in the URI; the query text is stored in the <xref:System.Uri.Query%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 查詢資訊就會遵循問號 （？） URI; 中的任何文字查詢文字會儲存在<xref:System.Uri.Query%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 1.1, if the string specified to a constructor contains an unknown scheme and "c:\\", the Uri class inserts "//" after the colon.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 1.1 中，如果建構函式所指定的字串包含未知的配置和"c:\\"，Uri 類別插入"/ /"冒號後面。

trans-unit.source: For example, the URI `xyz:c:\abc` is converted to `xyz://c:/abc`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，URI`xyz:c:\abc`轉換成`xyz://c:/abc`。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0, this behavior has been removed, and the example string is converted to `xyz:c:/abc`.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 版中，已移除這種行為，而字串範例會轉換成`xyz:c:/abc`。

trans-unit.source: The URI class supports the use of IP addresses in both quad-notation for IPv4 protocol and colon-hexadecimal for IPv6 protocol.
trans-unit.target: URI 類別支援使用的 IP 位址在 IPv4 通訊協定的兩個四標記法和冒號-十六進位 IPv6 通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Remember to enclose the IPv6 address in square brackets, as in http://[::1].
trans-unit.target: 請記得在方括號，如同 http://[::1 括住 IPv6 位址]。

trans-unit.source: International Resource Identifier Support
trans-unit.target: 國際資源識別項的支援

trans-unit.source: Web addresses are typically expressed using uniform resource identifiers that consist of a very restricted set of characters:
trans-unit.target: 網址通常會使用非常有限的一組字元所組成的統一資源識別元來表示：

trans-unit.source: Upper and lower case ASCII letters from the English alphabet.
trans-unit.target: 大寫和小寫的英文 ASCII 字母。

trans-unit.source: Digits from 0 to 9.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 9 位數。

trans-unit.source: A small number of other ASCII symbols.
trans-unit.target: 少數幾個其他 ASCII 符號。

trans-unit.source: The specifications for URIs are documented in RFC 2396, RFC 2732, RFC 3986, and RFC 3987 published by the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF).
trans-unit.target: Uri 的規格記載於 RFC 2396、 RFC 2732、 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987 發佈根據網際網路工程任務推動小組 (IETF)。

trans-unit.source: With the growth of the Internet, there is a growing need to identify resources using languages other than English.
trans-unit.target: 隨著網際網路的成長，識別使用非英文語言資源的需求也持續成長。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers which facilitate this need and allow non-ASCII characters (characters in the Unicode/ISO 10646 character set) are known as International Resource Identifiers (IRIs).
trans-unit.target: 有利此需求且允許非 ASCII 字元 (Unicode/ISO 10646 字元集中的字元) 的識別碼，稱為國際資源識別碼 (IRI)。

trans-unit.source: The specifications for IRIs are documented in RFC 3987 published by IETF.
trans-unit.target: IETF 發行的 RFC 3987 中有記載 IRI 的規格。

trans-unit.source: Using IRIs allows a URL to contain Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IRI 可讓 URL 包含 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref:System.Uri> class has been extended in .NET Framework v3.5, 3.0 SP1, and 2.0 SP1 to provide IRI support based on RFC 3987.
trans-unit.target: 現有<xref:System.Uri>類別已經過擴充，在.NET Framework v3.5、 3.0 SP1、 2.0 SP1 提供 IRI 支援根據和 RFC 3987。

trans-unit.source: Users of .NET Framework versions before version 4.5 will not see any change from the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior unless they specifically enable IRI.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework 4.5 版之前的使用者不會看到從.NET Framework 2.0 行為的任何變更，除非它們特別啟用 IRI。

trans-unit.source: This ensures application compatibility with prior versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保應用程式與舊版 .NET framework 相容。

trans-unit.source: To enable support for IRI, the following change is required:
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用 IRI 的支援，下列變更是必要的：

trans-unit.source: Specify whether you want Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing applied to the domain name and whether IRI parsing rules should be applied.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析套用至網域名稱，以及是否應該套用 IRI 剖析規則。

trans-unit.source: This can be done in the *machine.config* or in the *app.config* file.
trans-unit.target: 這可以在中完成*machine.config*或*app.config*檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, add the following:
trans-unit.target: 例如，加入下列：

trans-unit.source: Users of .NET Framework 4.5 and newer always have IRI enabled.
trans-unit.target: 使用者的.NET Framework 4.5 及更新版本一律具有 IRI 啟用。

trans-unit.source: IRI parsing cannot be changed using a *.config* file.
trans-unit.target: IRI 剖析無法變更使用*.config*檔案。

trans-unit.source: Enabling IDN will convert all Unicode labels in a domain name to their Punycode equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 IDN 會將網域名稱中所有的 Unicode 標籤轉換成對等的 Punycode。

trans-unit.source: Punycode names contain only ASCII characters and always start with the xn-- prefix.
trans-unit.target: Punycode 名稱只包含 ASCII 字元，而且開頭一律為前置詞 xn--。

trans-unit.source: The reason for this is to support existing DNS servers on the Internet, since most DNS servers only support ASCII characters (see RFC 3940).
trans-unit.target: 這是為了支援網際網路上現有的 DNS 伺服器，因為大部分的 DNS 伺服器僅支援 ASCII 字元 (請參閱 RFC 3940)。

trans-unit.source: Enabling IRI and IDN affects the value of the <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 IRI 和 IDN 會影響 <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Enabling IRI and IDN can also change the behavior of the <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A>, <xref:System.Uri.OriginalString%2A>, <xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A>, and <xref:System.Uri.IsWellFormedOriginalString%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 IRI 和 IDN 也可以變更 <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A>、<xref:System.Uri.OriginalString%2A>、<xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A> 和 <xref:System.Uri.IsWellFormedOriginalString%2A> 方法的行為。

trans-unit.source: There are three possible values for IDN depending on the DNS servers that are used:
trans-unit.target: 有三個可能的值為 IDN 根據所使用的 DNS 伺服器：

trans-unit.source: idn enabled = All
trans-unit.target: 啟用 idn = All

trans-unit.source: This value will convert any Unicode domain names to their Punycode equivalents (IDN names).
trans-unit.target: 這個值會將任何 Unicode 網域名稱轉換成 Punycode 的對等名稱 (IDN 名稱)。

trans-unit.source: idn enabled = AllExceptIntranet
trans-unit.target: 啟用 idn = AllExceptIntranet

trans-unit.source: This value will convert all Unicode domain names not on the local Intranet to use the Punycode equivalents (IDN names).
trans-unit.target: 此值將轉換為不在近端內部網路使用 Punycode 對等項目 （IDN 名稱） 上的所有 Unicode 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: In this case to handle international names on the local Intranet, the DNS servers that are used for the Intranet should support Unicode name resolution.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，若要處理國際性近端內部網路上的名稱，用於內部網路的 DNS 伺服器應該支援 Unicode 名稱解析。

trans-unit.source: idn enabled = None
trans-unit.target: 啟用 idn = 無

trans-unit.source: This value will not convert any Unicode domain names to use Punycode.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不會轉換任何 Unicode 網域名稱即可使用 Punycode。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value which is consistent with the .NET Framework 2.0 behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值是與.NET Framework 2.0 的行為一致。

trans-unit.source: When IRI parsing is enabled (iriParsing enabled = `true`) normalization and character checking are done according to the latest IRI rules in RFC 3986 and RFC 3987.
trans-unit.target: 當啟用 IRI 剖析 (啟用 iriParsing = `true`) 根據 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987 中的最新 IRI 規則進行正規化和字元檢查。

trans-unit.source: When IRI parsing is disabled, normalization and character checking are performed according to RFC 2396 and RFC 2732 (for IPv6 literals).
trans-unit.target: 停用 IRI 剖析時，正規化和字元檢查都是根據 RFC 2396 和 RFC 2732 （適用於 IPv6 常值）。

trans-unit.source: In versions of the .NET Framework before version 4.5, the default value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 4.5 版之前的版本中，預設值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: In .NET Framework version 4.5 and newer, the default value is `true`, and the enabled state of IRI parsing cannot be modified by settings in a *.config* file.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 4.5 版及更新版本中，預設值是`true`，而且無法修改 IRI 剖析的啟用的狀態中的設定所*.config*檔案。

trans-unit.source: IRI and IDN processing in the <xref:System.Uri> class can also be controlled using the <xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Configuration.UriSection?displayProperty=nameWithType> configuration setting classes.
trans-unit.target: IRI 和處理中的 IDN<xref:System.Uri>類別可以也使用來控制<xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Configuration.UriSection?displayProperty=nameWithType>組態設定的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> setting enables or disables IRI processing in the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> 設定可啟用或停用 <xref:System.Uri> 類別中的 IRI 處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> setting enables or disables IDN processing in the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> 設定可啟用或停用 <xref:System.Uri> 類別中的 IDN 處理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> setting also indirectly controls IDN.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> 設定也可以間接控制 IDN。

trans-unit.source: IRI processing must be enabled for IDN processing to be possible.
trans-unit.target: 必須啟用 IRI 處理才能進行 IDN 處理。

trans-unit.source: If IRI processing is disabled, then IDN processing will be set to the default setting where the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior is used for compatibility and IDN names are not used.
trans-unit.target: 如果停用 IRI 處理，則 IDN 處理會設定為預設設定，此種情況下，.NET Framework 2.0 行為會用於相容性，但不使用 IDN 名稱。

trans-unit.source: The configuration setting for the <xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement?displayProperty=nameWithType> will be read once when the first <xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=nameWithType> class is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 組態設定<xref:System.Configuration.IriParsingElement?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Configuration.IdnElement?displayProperty=nameWithType>會讀取一次當第一個<xref:System.Uri?displayProperty=nameWithType>類別建構。

trans-unit.source: Changes to configuration settings after that time are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 該時間之後的組態設定變更會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GenericUriParser?displayProperty=nameWithType> class has also been extended to allow creating a customizable parser that supports IRI and IDN.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GenericUriParser?displayProperty=nameWithType> 類別也已經擴充，允許建立可自訂的剖析器，支援 IRI 和 IDN。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of a <xref:System.GenericUriParser?displayProperty=nameWithType> object is specified by passing a bitwise combination of the values available in the <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration to the <xref:System.GenericUriParser?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <xref:System.GenericUriParser?displayProperty=nameWithType> 物件行為的方法，是將 <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions?displayProperty=nameWithType> 列舉中的可用值位元組合傳遞至 <xref:System.GenericUriParser?displayProperty=nameWithType> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions.IriParsing?displayProperty=nameWithType> type indicates the parser supports the parsing rules specified in RFC 3987 for International Resource Identifiers (IRI).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions.IriParsing?displayProperty=nameWithType> 類型，指出支援 RFC 3987 指定的國際資源識別碼 (IRI) 剖析規則的剖析器。

trans-unit.source: Whether IRI is used is dictated by the configuration values previously discussed.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用 IRI 取決於先前討論過的組態值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions.Idn?displayProperty=nameWithType> type indicates the parser supports Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing (IDN) of host names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.GenericUriParserOptions.Idn?displayProperty=nameWithType> 類型，指出剖析器支援主機名稱的國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析。

trans-unit.source: Whether IDN is used is dictated by the configuration values previously discussed.
trans-unit.target: 是否使用 IDN 的取決於先前討論過的組態值。

trans-unit.source: Performance Considerations
trans-unit.target: 效能考量

trans-unit.source: If you use a *Web.config *file that contains URIs to initialize your application, additional time is required to process the URIs if their scheme identifiers are nonstandard.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用 *Web.config * 檔案，其中包含 Uri，初始化您的應用程式，其他時間，才能處理 Uri，如果其配置識別碼並非標準用法。

trans-unit.source: In such a case, initialize the affected parts of your application when the URIs are needed, not at start time.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，初始化應用程式的受影響的部分 Uri 會在需要時，不是在開始時間。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an instance of the <xref:System.Uri> class and uses it to create a <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立的執行個體<xref:System.Uri>類別，並使用它來建立<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Because of security concerns, your application should use caution when accepting <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instances from untrusted sources and with <paramref name="dontEscape" /> set to <see langword="true" />.You can check a URI string for validity by calling the <see cref="M:System.Uri.IsWellFormedOriginalString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性考量，您的應用程式時應謹慎小心接受<see cref="T:System.Uri" />從不受信任來源與執行個體<paramref name="dontEscape" />設<see langword="true" />。您可以藉由呼叫來檢查有效性的 URI 字串<see cref="M:System.Uri.IsWellFormedOriginalString" />方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies the resource to be represented by the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 字串，指定要由 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體代表的資源。

trans-unit.source: Note that an IPv6 address in string form must be enclosed within brackets.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，字串形式的 IPv6 位址必須以括號括住。

trans-unit.source: For example, "http://[2607:f8b0:400d:c06::69]".
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> class with the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URI，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance from a URI string.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Uri>從 URI 字串的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It parses the URI, puts it in canonical format, and makes any required escape encodings.
trans-unit.target: 它會剖析 URI、 將它放在標準格式，並可讓任何必要的逸出的編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not ensure that the <xref:System.Uri> refers to an accessible resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不會保證，<xref:System.Uri>指的是可存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: This constructor assumes that the `string` parameter references an absolute URI and is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Uri.%23ctor%2A> constructor with <xref:System.UriKind> set to <xref:System.UriKind.Absolute>.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式假設`string`參數參考的絕對 URI，而且相當於呼叫<xref:System.Uri.%23ctor%2A>具有建構函式<xref:System.UriKind>設<xref:System.UriKind.Absolute>。

trans-unit.source: If the `string` parameter passed to the constructor is a relative URI, this constructor will throw a <xref:System.UriFormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`string`參數傳遞至建構函式是相對 URI，這個建構函式將會擲回<xref:System.UriFormatException>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance with the URI "http://www.contoso.com/".
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Uri>執行個體的 uri"http://www.contoso.com/"。

<see langword="true" /> if <c>uriString</c> is completely escaped; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> class with the specified URI, with explicit control of character escaping.
trans-unit.target: 以明確的字元逸出控制方式，初始化具有指定 URI 的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance from a URI string.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Uri>從 URI 字串的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It parses the URI and puts it in canonical format.
trans-unit.target: 它會剖析 URI，並將它放在標準格式。

trans-unit.source: The `dontEscape` parameter controls whether reserved characters are translated into escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: `dontEscape`參數會控制是否保留的字元會轉譯成逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: This parameter should be set to `true` only if you are certain that all reserved characters in the URI have been escaped.
trans-unit.target: 此參數應設為`true`僅如果您確定所有保留的字元，在 URI 中已被逸出。

trans-unit.source: Setting the value to `true` for a URI that has not been completely escaped can cause unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 將值設定為`true`針對具有未已完全逸出 URI 可能會導致非預期的行為。

trans-unit.source: It is strongly recommended that you always set this parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 強烈建議您一律將這個參數設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: If `dontEscape` is set to `false`, the constructor escapes any reserved characters by checking that all occurrences of percent (%) are followed by a valid escape sequence.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dontEscape`設`false`，藉由檢查有效的逸出序列所遵循的百分比 （%） 的所有項目建構函式逸出的任何保留的字元。

trans-unit.source: If the character sequence following a percent is not valid, the percent is replaced by %25.
trans-unit.target: 如果下列百分比表示的字元序列不是有效的 %取代 %25。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not ensure that the <xref:System.Uri> refers to an accessible resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不會保證，<xref:System.Uri>指的是可存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance for the URI http://www.contoso.com/Hello%20World.htm.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Uri>uri 執行個體http://www.contoso.com/Hello%20World.htm。

trans-unit.source: Because the contained URI is completely escaped and is in canonical form, the `dontEscape` parameter can be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 包含的 URI 完全逸出，並採用標準格式，因為`dontEscape`參數可以設定為`true`。

Specifies whether the URI string is a relative URI, absolute URI, or is indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: 指定 URI 字串是相對 URI、絕對 URI 或是不定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> class with the specified URI.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 URI，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to specify if the URI string is a relative URI, absolute URI, or is indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式可讓您指定 URI 字串是相對 URI、絕對 URI 或是不定。

trans-unit.source: Relative and absolute URIs have different restrictions on their format.
trans-unit.target: 相對與絕對 Uri 的格式有不同的限制。

trans-unit.source: For example, a relative URI does not require a scheme or an authority.
trans-unit.target: 例如，相對 URI 不需要配置或授權。

trans-unit.source: The value you specify in `uriKind` must match the type of URI passed in `uriString`.
trans-unit.target: 在您指定的值`uriKind`必須符合 URI 中傳遞的型別`uriString`。

trans-unit.source: However, if <xref:System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute> is specified, the URI string can be relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.UriKind.RelativeOrAbsolute>指定 URI 字串可以是相對或絕對。

trans-unit.target: 根據指定的基底 URI 和相對 URI 字串，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance by combining the `baseUri` and the `relativeUri`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Uri>結合的執行個體`baseUri`和`relativeUri`。

trans-unit.source: If `relativeUri` is an absolute URI (containing a scheme, host name, and optionally a port number), the <xref:System.Uri> instance is created using only `relativeUri`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`relativeUri`是絕對 URI （包含配置、 主機名稱和選擇性的連接埠號碼），<xref:System.Uri>建立執行個體只使用`relativeUri`。

trans-unit.source: If the `baseUri` has relative parts (like `/api`), then the relative part must be terminated with a slash, (like `/api/`), if the relative part of `baseUri` is to be preserved in the constructed <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`baseUri`有相對的部分 (像`/api`)，則必須以斜線，結束相對的組件 (類似`/api/`)，如果相對一部分`baseUri`即將成為保留在建構<xref:System.Uri>。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the `relativeUri` begins with a slash, then it will replace any relative part of the `baseUri`
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果`relativeUri`開頭斜線，則它會取代的任何相對部分 `baseUri`

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not ensure that the <xref:System.Uri> refers to an accessible resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不會保證，<xref:System.Uri>指的是可存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Uri> class by combining the relative URIs http://www.contoso.com and catalog/shownew.htm to form the absolute URI http://www.contoso.com/catalog/shownew.htm.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Uri>類別藉由結合的相對 Urihttp://www.contoso.com和形成的絕對 URI catalog/shownew.htm http://www.contoso.com/catalog/shownew.htm。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="baseUri" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="baseUri" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="baseUri" /> is not an absolute <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="baseUri" /> 不是絕對 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <block subset="none" type="note"> <para>In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />, instead.</para> </block>
trans-unit.target: <block subset="none" type="note"> <para>在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或是[可攜式類別庫](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改為攔截基底類別例外狀況 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。</para> </block>

trans-unit.source: The URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> is empty or contains only spaces.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 是空的，或只包含空格。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The scheme specified in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，指定的配置無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> contains too many slashes.
trans-unit.target: 以合併 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 的方式形成的 URI 含有太多斜線。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The password specified in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，指定的密碼無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The host name specified in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，指定的主機名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The file name specified in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，指定的檔案名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The user name specified in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，指定的使用者名稱無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The host or authority name specified in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> cannot be terminated by backslashes.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，指定的主機或授權名稱不得以反斜線結尾。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The port number specified in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> is not valid or cannot be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，指定的連接埠編號無效或無法剖析。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The length of the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> exceeds 65519 characters.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 長度超過 65519 個字元。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The length of the scheme specified in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" /> exceeds 1023 characters.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，指定的配置長度超過 1023 個字元。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is an invalid character sequence in the URI formed by combining <paramref name="baseUri" /> and <paramref name="relativeUri" />.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <paramref name="baseUri" /> 和 <paramref name="relativeUri" /> 所形成的 URI 中，字元序列無效。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The MS-DOS path specified in <paramref name="uriString" /> must start with c:\\\\.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="uriString" /> 中指定的 MS-DOS 路徑必須以 c:\\\\ 開頭。

trans-unit.source: An absolute <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> that is the base for the new <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 絕對 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />，是新 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體的基底。

trans-unit.source: A relative <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance that is combined with <c>baseUri</c>.
trans-unit.target: 與 <c>baseUri</c> 結合的相對 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> class based on the combination of a specified base <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance and a relative <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 根據指定的基底 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體和相對 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體的組合，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a new <xref:System.Uri> instance by combining an absolute <xref:System.Uri> instance, `baseUri`, with a relative <xref:System.Uri> instance, `relativeUri`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立新<xref:System.Uri>結合絕對的執行個體<xref:System.Uri>執行個體， `baseUri`，與相對<xref:System.Uri>執行個體， `relativeUri`。

trans-unit.source: If `relativeUri` is an absolute <xref:System.Uri> instance (containing a scheme, host name, and optionally a port number), the <xref:System.Uri> instance is created using only `relativeUri`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`relativeUri`為 absolute <xref:System.Uri> （包含配置、 主機名稱和選擇性的連接埠號碼） 的執行個體，<xref:System.Uri>建立執行個體只使用`relativeUri`。

trans-unit.source: If the `baseUri` has relative parts (like `/api`), then the relative part must be terminated with a slash, (like `/api/`), if the relative part of `baseUri` is to be preserved in the constructed <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`baseUri`有相對的部分 (像`/api`)，則必須以斜線，結束相對的組件 (類似`/api/`)，如果相對一部分`baseUri`即將成為保留在建構<xref:System.Uri>。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the `relativeUri` begins with a slash, then it will replace any relative part of the `baseUri`
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果`relativeUri`開頭斜線，則它會取代的任何相對部分 `baseUri`

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not ensure that the <xref:System.Uri> refers to an accessible resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不會保證，<xref:System.Uri>指的是可存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: This example creates an absolute <xref:System.Uri> instance, `absoluteUri`, and a relative <xref:System.Uri> instance, `relativeUri`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立絕對<xref:System.Uri>執行個體， `absoluteUri`，而是相對<xref:System.Uri>執行個體， `relativeUri`。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Uri> instance, `combinedUri`, is then created from these two instances.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.Uri>執行個體， `combinedUri`，接著會建立從這兩個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="baseUri" /> is not an absolute <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="baseUri" /> 不是絕對 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="baseUri" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="baseUri" /> 不是絕對 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The base URI.
trans-unit.target: 基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: The relative URI to add to the base URI.
trans-unit.target: 要加入基底 URI 的相對 URI。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <c>uriString</c> is completely escaped; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>uriString</c> 已完全逸出則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> class based on the specified base and relative URIs, with explicit control of character escaping.
trans-unit.target: 以明確的字元逸出控制方式，根據指定的基底和相對 URI，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance by combining `baseUri` and `relativeUri`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會建立<xref:System.Uri>結合的執行個體`baseUri`和`relativeUri`。

trans-unit.source: If the URI passed in `relativeUri` is an absolute URI (containing a scheme, host name, and optionally a port number), the <xref:System.Uri> instance is created using only `relativeUri`.
trans-unit.target: 如果 URI 傳入`relativeUri`是絕對 URI （包含配置、 主機名稱和選擇性的連接埠號碼），<xref:System.Uri>建立執行個體只使用`relativeUri`。

trans-unit.source: The `dontEscape` parameter controls whether reserved characters are translated into escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: `dontEscape`參數會控制是否保留的字元會轉譯成逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: This parameter should be set to `true` only if you are certain that all reserved characters in the URI have been escaped.
trans-unit.target: 此參數應設為`true`僅如果您確定所有保留的字元，在 URI 中已被逸出。

trans-unit.source: Setting the value to `true` for a URI that has not been completely escaped can cause unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 將值設定為`true`針對具有未已完全逸出 URI 可能會導致非預期的行為。

trans-unit.source: It is strongly recommended that you always set this parameter to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 強烈建議您一律將這個參數設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: If `dontEscape` is set to `false`, the constructor escapes any reserved characters by checking that all occurrences of percent (%) are followed by a valid escape sequence.
trans-unit.target: 如果`dontEscape`設`false`，藉由檢查有效的逸出序列所遵循的百分比 （%） 的所有項目建構函式逸出的任何保留的字元。

trans-unit.source: If the character sequence following a percent is not valid, the percent is replaced by %25.
trans-unit.target: 如果下列百分比表示的字元序列不是有效的 %取代 %25。

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not ensure that the <xref:System.Uri> refers to an accessible resource.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不會保證，<xref:System.Uri>指的是可存取的資源。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Uri> class by combining the relative URIs http://www.contoso.com and Hello%20World.htm to form an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Uri>類別藉由結合的相對 Urihttp://www.contoso.com和 Hello%20World.htm 形成絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: Because of security concerns, your application should not call this constructor with URI strings from untrusted sources and with <paramref name="dontEscape" /> set to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 基於安全性考量，您的應用程式不應該呼叫這個建構函式，使用 URI 字串從不受信任來源與<paramref name="dontEscape" />設<see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Alternately, you can check a URI string for validity by calling the <see cref="M:System.Uri.IsWellFormedOriginalString" /> method prior to calling this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以藉由呼叫檢查有效的 URI 字串<see cref="M:System.Uri.IsWellFormedOriginalString" />方法之前呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the absolute path of the URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URI 的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the absolute path to the resource.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含資源的絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.AbsolutePath%2A> property contains the path information that the server uses to resolve requests for information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.AbsolutePath%2A>屬性包含伺服器用來解析要求資訊的路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: Typically this is the path to the desired information on the server's file system, although it also can indicate the application or script the server must run to provide the information.
trans-unit.target: 通常這是所需資訊的伺服器檔案系統上，路徑，雖然也可能表示應用程式或指令碼，則伺服器必須執行提供的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The path information does not include the scheme, host name, or query portion of the URI.
trans-unit.target: 配置、 主機名稱或 URI 的查詢部分，不包含路徑資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following example writes the path /catalog/shownew.htm to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將路徑 /catalog/shownew.htm 寫入主控台。

trans-unit.source: This instance represents a relative URI, and this property is valid only for absolute URIs.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體代表相對的 URI，而這個屬性只適用於絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the entire URI.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含整個 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.AbsoluteUri%2A> property includes the entire URI stored in the <xref:System.Uri> instance, including all fragments and query strings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.AbsoluteUri%2A>屬性包含儲存在對整個 URI<xref:System.Uri>執行個體，包括所有片段與查詢字串。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例的完整內容寫入<xref:System.Uri>到主控台的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: In the example shown, http://www.contoso.com/catalog/shownew.htm?date=today is written to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中所示，http://www.contoso.com/catalog/shownew.htm?date=today寫入至主控台。

trans-unit.source: This instance represents a relative URI, and this property is valid only for absolute URIs.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體代表相對的 URI，而這個屬性只適用於絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Domain Name System (DNS) host name or IP address and the port number for a server.
trans-unit.target: 取得伺服器的網域名稱系統 (DNS) 主機名稱或 IP 位址，以及連接埠編號。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the authority component of the URI represented by this instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含這個執行個體所代表之 URI 的授權元件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.Authority%2A> property is typically a server DNS host name or IP address.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.Authority%2A>屬性通常是伺服器的 DNS 主機名稱或 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: This property might include the service port number if it differs from the default port for the URI.
trans-unit.target: 如果不同於預設的連接埠 uri，這個屬性可能包含服務連接埠號碼。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Uri.Authority%2A> component contains reserved characters, these are escaped in the string value returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Uri.Authority%2A>元件包含保留的字元，這些會逸出這個屬性所傳回的字串值中。

trans-unit.source: The following example writes the host name (www.contoso.com) and port number (8080) of the server to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會寫主機名稱 (www.contoso.com) 和連接埠號碼 (8080) 要在主控台的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: This instance represents a relative URI, and this property is valid only for absolute URIs.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體代表相對的 URI，而這個屬性只適用於絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: Converts the internally stored URI to canonical form.
trans-unit.target: 將內部儲存的 URI 轉換成標準格式。

trans-unit.source: Stores the canonical version of the URI internally.
trans-unit.target: 會在內部儲存 URI 的標準版本。

trans-unit.source: This instance represents a relative URI, and this method is valid only for absolute URIs.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體表示相對的 URI，而這個方法只適用於絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: The URI is incorrectly formed.
trans-unit.target: URI 的語式不正確。

trans-unit.source: The host name to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: This can be an IPv4 or IPv6 address or an Internet host name.
trans-unit.target: 這可以是 IPv4 或 IPv6 位址或網際網路主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified host name is a valid DNS name.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的主機名稱是否為有效的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.UriHostNameType" /> that indicates the type of the host name.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.UriHostNameType" />，表示主機名稱的類型。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the host name cannot be determined or if the host name is <see langword="null" /> or a zero-length string, this method returns <see cref="F:System.UriHostNameType.Unknown" />.
trans-unit.target: 當無法判斷主機名稱類型，或主機名稱為 <see langword="null" /> 或長度為零的字串時，這個方法會傳回 <see cref="F:System.UriHostNameType.Unknown" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.CheckHostName%2A> method checks that the host name provided meets the requirements for a valid Internet host name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.CheckHostName%2A>方法會檢查提供的主機名稱符合有效的網際網路主機名稱的需求。

trans-unit.source: It does not, however, perform a host-name lookup to verify the existence of the host.
trans-unit.target: 它不會不過，執行的主機名稱查閱，若要驗證主機存在。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether the host name is valid.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查主機名稱是否有效。

trans-unit.source: The scheme name to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的配置名稱。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified scheme name is valid.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的配置名稱是否有效。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that is <see langword="true" /> if the scheme name is valid; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果配置名稱有效，則 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method checks the scheme name for validity according to RFC 2396 by default.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查預設根據 RFC 2396 有效性的配置名稱。

trans-unit.source: If International Resource Identifiers (IRIs) or Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing is enabled, this method checks the scheme name for validity according to RFC 3986.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用國際資源識別元 （光圈） 或國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析時，這個方法會檢查根據 RFC 3986 有效性的配置名稱。

trans-unit.source: The scheme name must begin with a letter and must contain only letters, digits, and the characters ".", "+", or "-".
trans-unit.target: 配置名稱必須以字母開頭，而且必須包含字母、 數字和字元"。"，"+"或"-"。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Uri>類別。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Uri>執行個體，並檢查是否為有效的配置名稱。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法沒有任何作用。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 第一個 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 第二個 <see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.UriComponents" /> values that specifies the parts of <c>uri1</c> and <c>uri2</c> to compare.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.UriComponents" /> 值的位元組合，指定要比較之 <c>uri1</c> 和 <c>uri2</c> 的部分。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.UriFormat" /> values that specifies the character escaping used when the URI components are compared.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.UriFormat" /> 值之一，指定比較 URI 元件時所使用的字元逸出方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.StringComparison" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.StringComparison" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified parts of two URIs using the specified comparison rules.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的比較規則，比較兩個 URI 的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that indicates the lexical relationship between the compared <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> components.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示所比較之 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 元件間的語彙關聯性。

trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Meaning
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 意義

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Less than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term>小於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="uri1" /> is less than <paramref name="uri2" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="uri1" /> 小於 <paramref name="uri2" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="uri1" /> equals <paramref name="uri2" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="uri1" /> 等於 <paramref name="uri2" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 大於零

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="uri1" /> is greater than <paramref name="uri2" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="uri1" /> 大於 <paramref name="uri2" />。

trans-unit.source: If both `uri1` and `uri2` are `null`, this method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個`uri1`和`uri2`是`null`，這個方法會傳回 0。

trans-unit.source: When comparing URI values, a relative URI is always less than an absolute URI, and a non-null URI is always greater than a null URI.
trans-unit.target: 在比較 URI 值時，相對 URI 是一律小於絕對 URI 和非 null URI 大於一律為 null 的 URI。

trans-unit.source: For cases where both `uri1` and `uri2` are not `null` and are both relative URIs or both absolute URIs, the <xref:System.String.Compare%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.StringComparison%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method performs the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 情況下，同時`uri1`和`uri2`不`null`和相對 Uri 或這兩種絕對 Uri，<xref:System.String.Compare%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.StringComparison%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法執行的比較。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="comparisonType" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.StringComparison" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="comparisonType" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.StringComparison" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a host name that, after being unescaped if necessary, is safe to use for DNS resolution.
trans-unit.target: 取得在視需要取消逸出後，可放心用於 DNS 解析的主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the host part of the URI in a format suitable for DNS resolution; or the original host string, if it is already suitable for resolution.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />其中包含適用於 DNS 解析; 或原始的主機字串格式的 URI 的主機部分，如果它已經是適合用來解析。

trans-unit.source: For IPv6 addresses, the brackets ([]) are removed and the <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.ScopeId%2A> property is set, if one was specified when this instance was constructed.
trans-unit.target: 移除括號 ([]) 的 IPv6 位址和<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.ScopeId%2A>設定屬性，如果有指定建構這個執行個體時。

trans-unit.source: If you used an escaped string to construct this instance (for example, "http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%254]/temp/example.htm"), then DnsSafeHost returns an escaped string.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用的逸出的字串來建構這個執行個體 （例如，"http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%254]/temp/example.htm")，然後 DnsSafeHost 傳回逸出的字串。

trans-unit.source: Unescape any escaped string returned from `DnsSafeHost` before using that string for DNS resolution (see the Example).
trans-unit.target: Unescape 傳回任何逸出的字串`DnsSafeHost`之前進行 DNS 解析中使用該字串 （請參閱範例）。

trans-unit.source: If you used an invalid unescaped string to construct this instance (for example, "http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%4]/temp/example.htm"), then DnsSafeHost returns an unescaped string.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用了無效的逸出的字串來建構這個執行個體 （例如，"http://[fe80::200:39ff:fe36:1a2d%4]/temp/example.htm")，然後 DnsSafeHost 傳回未逸出的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A> property is dependent on configuration settings, as discussed later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>屬性的相依於組態設定，如本主題稍後所述。

trans-unit.source: Configuration settings cannot be changed by Windows Store applications, which can lead to inconsistent results when using <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 組態設定無法變更由 Windows 市集應用程式時可能會導致不一致的結果使用<xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.IdnHost%2A> property is provided as the preferred alternative to using <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>, because <xref:System.Uri.IdnHost%2A> is guaranteed to always be DNS safe, no matter what the current *app.config* settings might be.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.IdnHost%2A>屬性依現狀使用慣用的替代方式<xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>，因為<xref:System.Uri.IdnHost%2A>保證永遠是安全的無論何種目前 DNS *app.config*設定可能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A> property has been extended in .NET Framework v3.5, 3.0 SP1, and 2.0 SP1 to provide International Resource Identifier (IRI) support based on RFC 3987.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>屬性已在.NET Framework v3.5、 3.0 SP1、 擴充和 2.0 SP1 提供國際資源識別項 (IRI) 支援根據的 RFC 3987。

trans-unit.source: Current users will not see any change from the .NET Framework 2.0 behavior unless they specifically enable IRI.
trans-unit.target: 目前的使用者除非特別啟用 IRI，否則看不出與 .NET Framework 2.0 的行為有任何不同之處。

trans-unit.source: This ensures application compatibility with prior versions of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保應用程式與舊版 .NET framework 相容。

trans-unit.source: To enable support for IRI, the following two changes are required:
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用 IRI 的支援，下列兩項變更是必要的：

trans-unit.source: Add the following line to the *machine.config* file under the .NET Framework 2.0 directory
trans-unit.target: 將下列行加入*machine.config* .NET Framework 2.0 目錄下的檔案

trans-unit.source: \<section name="uri" type="System.Configuration.UriSection, System, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089" />
trans-unit.target: \<section name="uri" type="System.Configuration.UriSection, System, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089" />

trans-unit.source: Specify whether you want Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing applied to the domain name and whether IRI parsing rules should be applied.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否要國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析套用至網域名稱，以及是否應該套用 IRI 剖析規則。

trans-unit.source: This can be done in the *machine.config* or in the *app.config* file.
trans-unit.target: 這可以在中完成*machine.config*或*app.config*檔案。

trans-unit.source: For example, add the following:
trans-unit.target: 例如，加入下列：

trans-unit.source: Enabling IDN will convert all Unicode labels in a domain name to their Punycode equivalents.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 IDN 會將網域名稱中所有的 Unicode 標籤轉換成對等的 Punycode。

trans-unit.source: Punycode names contain only ASCII characters and always start with the xn-- prefix.
trans-unit.target: Punycode 名稱只包含 ASCII 字元，而且開頭一律為前置詞 xn--。

trans-unit.source: The reason for this is to support existing DNS servers on the Internet, since most DNS servers only support ASCII characters (see RFC 3940).
trans-unit.target: 這是為了支援網際網路上現有的 DNS 伺服器，因為大部分的 DNS 伺服器僅支援 ASCII 字元 (請參閱 RFC 3940)。

trans-unit.source: Enabling IDN only affects the value of the <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 IDN 只會影響值<xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: There are three possible values for IDN depending on the DNS servers that are used:
trans-unit.target: 有三個可能的值為 IDN 根據所使用的 DNS 伺服器：

trans-unit.source: idn enabled = All
trans-unit.target: 啟用 idn = All

trans-unit.source: This value will convert any Unicode domain names to their Punycode equivalents (IDN names).
trans-unit.target: 這個值會將任何 Unicode 網域名稱轉換成 Punycode 的對等名稱 (IDN 名稱)。

trans-unit.source: idn enabled = AllExceptIntranet
trans-unit.target: 啟用 idn = AllExceptIntranet

trans-unit.source: This value will convert all external Unicode domain names to use the Punycode equivalents (IDN names).
trans-unit.target: 這個值會將所有外部 Unicode 網域名稱轉換成使用 Punycode 的對等名稱 (IDN 名稱)。

trans-unit.source: In this case to handle international names on the local Intranet, the DNS servers that are used for the Intranet should support Unicode names.
trans-unit.target: 此例中，若要在近端內部網路上處理國際性名稱，則用於內部網路的 DNS 伺服器應該支援 Unicode 名稱。

trans-unit.source: idn enabled = None
trans-unit.target: 啟用 idn = 無

trans-unit.source: This value will not convert any Unicode domain names to use Punycode.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不會轉換任何 Unicode 網域名稱即可使用 Punycode。

trans-unit.source: This is the default value which is consistent with the .NET Framework 2.0 behaviour.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設值是與.NET Framework 2.0 的行為一致。

trans-unit.source: Enabling IRI parsing (iriParsing enabled = `true`) will do normalization and character checking according to the latest IRI rules in RFC 3987.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 IRI 剖析 (啟用 iriParsing = `true`) 將會執行正規化和 RFC 3987 字元檢查最新 IRI 根據規則。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `false` and will do normalization and character checking according to RFC 2396 and RFC 2732 (for IPv6 literals).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`false`會執行正規化和字元檢查根據 RFC 2396 和 RFC 2732 （適用於 IPv6 常值）。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Uri>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance from a string.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Uri>從字串的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It illustrates the difference between the value returned from <xref:System.Uri.Host%2A>, which returns the host name or address specified in the URI, and the value returned from <xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>, which returns an address that is safe to use in DNS resolution.
trans-unit.target: 它說明從傳回的值之間的差異<xref:System.Uri.Host%2A>傳回的主機名稱或 URI 中所指定的位址，從傳回的值<xref:System.Uri.DnsSafeHost%2A>，它會傳回可安全使用於 DNS 解析的位址。

trans-unit.source: As explained in Remarks, unescape the host name before resolving it.
trans-unit.target: < 備註 > 中所述，不要解決它之前逸出主機名稱。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Uri.UnescapeDataString%2A> method to unescape the host name, and you can resolve it by calling the <xref:System.Net.Dns.GetHostEntry%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Uri.UnescapeDataString%2A>方法來逸出主機名稱，而您就可以解決藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.Dns.GetHostEntry%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This instance represents a relative URI, and this property is valid only for absolute URIs.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體代表相對的 URI，而這個屬性只適用於絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance or a URI identifier to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 與目前之執行個體相比較的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體或 URI 識別項。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instances for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that is <see langword="true" /> if the two instances represent the same URI; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果兩個執行個體代表相同 URI，則 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A> method compares the two instances without regard to user information (<xref:System.Uri.UserInfo%2A>) and fragment (<xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A>) parts that they might contain.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A>方法會比較兩個執行個體，而不考慮使用者資訊 (<xref:System.Uri.UserInfo%2A>) 以及片段 (<xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A>) 它們可能包含的組件。

trans-unit.source: For example, given the URIs http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search and http://user:password@www.contoso.com/index.htm, the <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A> method would return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，給定 Urihttp://www.contoso.com/index.htm#search和http://user:password@www.contoso.com/index.htm、<xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A>方法會傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: If one <xref:System.Uri> instance is formed with a Unicode host name and `comparand` parameter contains a <xref:System.Uri> instance or identifier that is formed with a host name that has the equivalent Punycode host name, then <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A> returns `true` only if International Resource Identifier (IRI) and Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) support are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果一個<xref:System.Uri>執行個體的正確使用 Unicode 的主機名稱和`comparand`參數包含<xref:System.Uri>執行個體或主機名稱有一個具有對等的 Punycode 主機名稱，然後構成的識別項<xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A>傳回`true`支援國際資源識別項 (IRI) 和國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 時，才會啟用。

trans-unit.source: Punycode names contain only ASCII characters and always start with the xn-- prefix.
trans-unit.target: Punycode 名稱只包含 ASCII 字元，而且開頭一律為前置詞 xn--。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Uri>類別。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, the <xref:System.Uri.Query%2A> is also ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版，<xref:System.Uri.Query%2A>也會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A> method can be overridden in a derived class; use caution as a malicious entity could modify the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A>衍生類別中覆寫方法; 請謹慎因為惡意的實體無法修改的方法。

trans-unit.source: You should not use this method to perform security checks unless you know that this instance came from a trusted source.
trans-unit.target: 您不應該使用這個方法來執行安全性檢查，除非您知道此執行個體來自受信任的來源。

trans-unit.source: This example creates two <xref:System.Uri> instances from strings and compares them to determine whether they represent the same value.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立兩個<xref:System.Uri>從字串執行個體，並比較它們，以判斷它們是否表示相同的值。

trans-unit.source: `address1` and `address2` are the same because the <xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A> portion is ignored for this comparison.
trans-unit.target: `address1` 和`address2`不相同，因為<xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A>部分會忽略此項比較。

trans-unit.source: The outcome is written to the console.
trans-unit.target: 結果會寫入至主控台。

trans-unit.source: to prevent partially trusted code from deriving from <see cref="T:System.Uri" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止部分信任程式碼衍生自<see cref="T:System.Uri" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.Infrastructure" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts any unsafe or reserved characters in the path component to their hexadecimal character representations.
trans-unit.target: 將路徑元件中的任何不安全或保留字元轉換成十六進位字元表示。

trans-unit.source: The URI passed from the constructor is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 從建構函式傳遞的 URI 無效。

trans-unit.source: This exception can occur if a URI has too many characters or the URI is relative.
trans-unit.target: 如果 URI 有太多字元或為相對 URI，就會發生這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The string to escape.
trans-unit.target: 要逸出的字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts a string to its escaped representation.
trans-unit.target: 將字串轉換成它的逸出表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the escaped representation of <paramref name="stringToEscape" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> 的逸出表示。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Uri.EscapeDataString%2A> method converts all characters except for RFC 2396 unreserved characters to their hexadecimal representation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Uri.EscapeDataString%2A>方法會將 RFC 2396 非保留字元除外的所有字元都轉換成其十六進位表示法。

trans-unit.source: If International Resource Identifiers (IRIs) or Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing is enabled, the <xref:System.Uri.EscapeDataString%2A> method converts all characters, except for RFC 3986 unreserved characters, to their hexadecimal representation.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用國際資源識別元 （光圈） 或國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析，<xref:System.Uri.EscapeDataString%2A>方法將所有字元，除了 RFC 3986 非保留的字元，其十六進位表示法。

trans-unit.source: All Unicode characters are converted to UTF-8 format before being escaped.
trans-unit.target: 之前要逸出，所有 Unicode 字元都轉換成 utf-8 格式。

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that `stringToEscape` has no escape sequences in it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會假設`stringToEscape`中有任何逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: By default, the string is escaped according to RFC 2396.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此字串是根據 RFC 2396 逸出。

trans-unit.source: If International Resource Identifiers (IRIs) or Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing is enabled, the string is escaped according to RFC 3986 and RFC 3987.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用國際資源識別元 （光圈） 或國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析，則字串會根據 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987 逸出。

trans-unit.source: See these RFCs for a definition of reserved and unreserved characters.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱這些 Rfc 定義的保留和非保留字元。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Uri>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <block subset="none" type="note"> <para>In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />, instead.</para> </block>
trans-unit.target: <block subset="none" type="note"> <para>在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或是[可攜式類別庫](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改為攔截基底類別例外狀況 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。</para> </block>

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> exceeds 32766 characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> 的長度超過 32766 個字元。

trans-unit.source: The string to transform to its escaped representation.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換成其逸出表示的字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts a string to its escaped representation.
trans-unit.target: 將字串轉換成它的逸出表示。

trans-unit.source: The escaped representation of the string.
trans-unit.target: 字串的逸出表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.EscapeString%2A> method converts RFC 2396 reserved characters and all characters with a character value greater than 127 to hexadecimal representation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.EscapeString%2A>方法會將 RFC 2396 保留字元和字元值大於 127 的所有字元轉換成十六進位表示法。

trans-unit.source: All Unicode characters are converted to UTF-8 format before being escaped.
trans-unit.target: 之前要逸出，所有 Unicode 字元都轉換成 utf-8 格式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the string is escaped according to RFC 2396.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此字串是根據 RFC 2396 逸出。

trans-unit.source: If International Resource Identifiers (IRIs) or Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing is enabled, the string is escaped according to RFC 3986 and RFC 3987.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用國際資源識別元 （光圈） 或國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析，則字串會根據 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987 逸出。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Uri>類別。

trans-unit.source: The string to escape.
trans-unit.target: 要逸出的字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts a URI string to its escaped representation.
trans-unit.target: 將 URI 字串轉換成它的逸出表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the escaped representation of <paramref name="stringToEscape" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> 的逸出表示。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Uri.EscapeUriString%2A> method to prepare an unescaped URI string to be a parameter to the <xref:System.Uri.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Uri.EscapeUriString%2A>方法以準備未逸出的 URI 字串是參數<xref:System.Uri.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Uri.EscapeUriString%2A> method converts all characters, except RFC 2396 unreserved characters, to their hexadecimal representation.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Uri.EscapeUriString%2A>方法會將 RFC 2396 非保留字元，之外的所有字元都轉換成其十六進位表示法。

trans-unit.source: If International Resource Identifiers (IRIs) or Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing is enabled, the <xref:System.Uri.EscapeUriString%2A> method converts all characters, except for RFC 3986 unreserved characters, to their hexadecimal representation.
trans-unit.target: 如果已啟用國際資源識別元 （光圈） 或國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析，<xref:System.Uri.EscapeUriString%2A>方法將所有字元，除了 RFC 3986 非保留的字元，其十六進位表示法。

trans-unit.source: All Unicode characters are converted to UTF-8 format before being escaped.
trans-unit.target: 之前要逸出，所有 Unicode 字元都轉換成 utf-8 格式。

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that `stringToEscape` has no escape sequences in it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會假設`stringToEscape`中有任何逸出序列。

trans-unit.source: By default, the string is escaped according to RFC 2396.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此字串是根據 RFC 2396 逸出。

trans-unit.source: If International Resource Identifiers (IRIs) or Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) parsing is enabled, the string is escaped according to RFC 3986 and RFC 3987.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用國際資源識別元 （光圈） 或國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 剖析，則字串會根據 RFC 3986 和 RFC 3987 逸出。

trans-unit.source: See these RFCs for a definition of reserved and unreserved characters.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱這些 Rfc 定義的保留和非保留字元。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Uri>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <block subset="none" type="note"> <para>In the [.NET for Windows Store apps](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) or the [Portable Class Library](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md), catch the base class exception, <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />, instead.</para> </block>
trans-unit.target: <block subset="none" type="note"> <para>在[適用於 Windows 市集應用程式的 .NET](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=247912) 或是[可攜式類別庫](~/docs/standard/cross-platform/cross-platform-development-with-the-portable-class-library.md)中，改為攔截基底類別例外狀況 <see cref="T:System.FormatException" />。</para> </block>

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> exceeds 32766 characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stringToEscape" /> 的長度超過 32766 個字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets the escaped URI fragment.
trans-unit.target: 取得逸出的 URI 片段。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains any URI fragment information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含任何 URI 片段資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A> property gets any text following a fragment marker (#) in the URI, including the fragment marker itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A>屬性會取得所有片段中的標記 （#） 的 URI，包括本身的片段標記文字。

trans-unit.source: Given the URI http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main, the <xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A> property would return #main.
trans-unit.target: 指定 URI http://www.contoso.com/index.htm#main、<xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A>屬性則會傳回 #main。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A> property is not considered in any <xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A> comparison.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.Fragment%2A>屬性不是在任何<xref:System.Uri.Equals%2A>比較。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance and writes the fragment information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Uri>執行個體，並寫入主控台中的片段資訊。

trans-unit.source: This instance represents a relative URI, and this property is valid only for absolute URIs.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體代表相對的 URI，而這個屬性只適用於絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: The hexadecimal digit (0-9, a-f, A-F) to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的十六進位數字 (0-9、a-f、A-F)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the decimal value of a hexadecimal digit.
trans-unit.target: 取得十六進位數字的十進位值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that contains a number from 0 to 15 that corresponds to the specified hexadecimal digit.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，包含 0 到 15 之間的一個數字，會對應到指定的十六進位數字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.FromHex%2A> method converts a character representing a hexadecimal digit (0-9, a-f, A-F) to its decimal value (0 to 15).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.FromHex%2A>方法會將轉換的字元表示的十六進位數字 (0-9、 a-f、 A-F) 為十進位值 （0 到 15 之間）。

trans-unit.source: If `digit` is not a valid hexadecimal digit, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果`digit`不是有效的十六進位數字、<xref:System.ArgumentException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example determines whether a character is a hexadecimal character and, if it is, writes the corresponding decimal value to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會判斷是否字元是否為十六進位字元而且，如果是，將對應的十進位值寫入主控台。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="digit" /> is not a valid hexadecimal digit (0-9, a-f, A-F).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="digit" /> 不是有效的十六進位數字 (0-9、a-f、A-F)。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.UriComponents" /> values that specifies which parts of the current instance to return to the caller.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.UriComponents" /> 值的位元組合，指定目前的執行個體中，要回傳給呼叫端的部分。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.UriFormat" /> values that controls how special characters are escaped.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.UriFormat" /> 值之一，控制特殊字元的逸出方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified components of the current instance using the specified escaping for special characters.
trans-unit.target: 針對特殊字元使用指定的逸出方式，取得目前執行個體的指定元件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the components.
trans-unit.target: 包含元件的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.UriComponents.Query>, <xref:System.UriComponents.Fragment>, <xref:System.UriComponents.Scheme>, <xref:System.UriComponents.UserInfo>, <xref:System.UriComponents.Host>, <xref:System.UriComponents.Port>, and <xref:System.UriComponents.Path> components do not include the delimiter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.UriComponents.Query>， <xref:System.UriComponents.Fragment>， <xref:System.UriComponents.Scheme>， <xref:System.UriComponents.UserInfo>， <xref:System.UriComponents.Host>， <xref:System.UriComponents.Port>，和<xref:System.UriComponents.Path>元件不包含分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: You can combine the <xref:System.UriComponents.KeepDelimiter> flag (using the bitwise OR operator) with any of those values to get the value with the delimiter.
trans-unit.target: 您可以結合<xref:System.UriComponents.KeepDelimiter>旗標 （使用位元 OR 運算子） 與任何這些值到取得具有分隔符號的值。

trans-unit.source: For all other <xref:System.UriComponents> values, and combinations of values, the delimiters are included in the returned value.
trans-unit.target: 如需所有其他<xref:System.UriComponents>值和值的組合中傳回的值包含分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The components are returned in the order that they appear in the URI.
trans-unit.target: 元件會出現在 URI 中的順序傳回。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.UriComponents.Scheme> is specified, it appears first.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.UriComponents.Scheme>指定，則第一個出現。

trans-unit.source: When International Resource Identifier (IRI) and Internationalized Domain Name (IDN) support are enabled, the number of characters returned in the <xref:System.String> increases.
trans-unit.target: 中支援國際資源識別項 (IRI) 和國際化網域名稱 (IDN) 啟用時，傳回的字元數<xref:System.String>會增加。

trans-unit.source: Punycode names used to support IRI contain only ASCII characters and always start with the xn-- prefix.
trans-unit.target: 用來支援 IRI Punycode 名稱只能包含 ASCII 字元，而且一律以 y2...xn-前置詞開頭。

trans-unit.source: When IRI and IDN are enabled, Unicode surrogate characters are handled correctly by the <xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: IRI 和 IDN 啟用時，正確地處理 Unicode surrogate 字元<xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on IRI support, see the Remarks section for the <xref:System.Uri> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 IRI 支援的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 備註 > 一節<xref:System.Uri>類別。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A> method is called with `format` set to <xref:System.UriFormat.Unescaped> , you cannot use the return value as an argument to a <xref:System.Uri.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create an equivalent <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Uri.GetComponents%2A>方法呼叫`format`設<xref:System.UriFormat.Unescaped>，您無法使用傳回的值做為引數<xref:System.Uri.%23ctor%2A>建構函式建立的對等項目<xref:System.Uri>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="components" /> is not a combination of valid <see cref="T:System.UriComponents" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="components" /> 不是有效 <see cref="T:System.UriComponents" /> 值的結合。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: 目前的 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 不是絕對 URI。

trans-unit.source: Relative URIs cannot be used with this method.
trans-unit.target: 相對 URI 不能用於這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the URI.
trans-unit.target: 取得 URI 的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> containing the hash value generated for this URI.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，包含為這個 URI 所產生的雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Uri> instance and writes the hash code to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Uri>執行個體，並寫入主控台中的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.UriPartial" /> values that specifies the end of the URI portion to return.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.UriPartial" /> 值之一，指定要傳回之 URI 的結尾部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified portion of a <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the specified portion of the <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 執行個體的指定部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri.GetLeftPart%2A> method returns a string containing the leftmost portion of the URI string, ending with the portion specified by `part`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.GetLeftPart%2A>方法會傳回字串，包含最左邊的部分 URI 字串中，結尾所指定的部分`part`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Uri.GetLeftPart%2A> includes delimiters in the following cases:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Uri.GetLeftPart%2A> 包含分隔符號，在下列情況：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.UriPartial.Scheme> includes the scheme delimiter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.UriPartial.Scheme> 包含配置分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.UriPartial.Authority> does not include the path delimiter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.UriPartial.Authority> 不包含路徑分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.UriPartial.Path> includes any delimiters in the original URI up to the query or fragment delimiter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.UriPartial.Path> 最多的查詢或片段的分隔符號與原始 URI 中包含任何分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.UriPartial.Query> includes the <xref:System.UriPartial.Path>, plus the query and its delimiter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.UriPartial.Query> 包含<xref:System.UriPartial.Path>，加上查詢以及其分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show a URI and the results of calling <xref:System.Uri.GetLeftPart%2A> with <xref:System.UriPartial.Scheme>, <xref:System.UriPartial.Authority>, <xref:System.UriPartial.Path>, or <xref:System.UriPartial.Query>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示 URI 和呼叫的結果<xref:System.Uri.GetLeftPart%2A>與<xref:System.UriPartial.Scheme>， <xref:System.UriPartial.Authority>， <xref:System.UriPartial.Path>，或<xref:System.UriPartial.Query>。

trans-unit.source: The character to convert to hexadecimal representation.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換成十六進位表示的字元。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified character into its hexadecimal equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的字元轉換成其對等的十六進位數字。

trans-unit.source: The hexadecimal representation of the specified character.
trans-unit.target: 指定字元的十六進位表示。

trans-unit.source: The following example converts a character to its hexadecimal equivalent and writes it to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將字元轉換成其十六進位對等，並將它寫入至主控台。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="character" /> is greater than 255.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="character" /> 大於 255。

trans-unit.source: The hexadecimal representation of a character.
trans-unit.target: 字元的十六進位表示。

trans-unit.source: The location in <c>pattern</c> where the hexadecimal representation of a character begins.
trans-unit.target: <c>pattern</c> 中的位置，字元的十六進位表示由此開始。

trans-unit.source: Converts a specified hexadecimal representation of a character to the character.
trans-unit.target: 將字元的指定十六進位表示轉換成字元。

trans-unit.source: The character represented by the hexadecimal encoding at position <paramref name="index" />.
trans-unit.target: 在位置 <paramref name="index" /> 時，字元會以十六進位編碼方式。

trans-unit.source: If the character at <paramref name="index" /> is not hexadecimal encoded, the character at <paramref name="index" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <paramref name="index" /> 的字元不是以十六進位編碼方式表示，就會傳回位於 <paramref name="index" /> 的字元。

trans-unit.source: The value of <paramref name="index" /> is incremented to point to the character following the one returned.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 的值會遞增，以指向傳回之字元後的字元。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會判斷字元是否為十六進位編碼，若是如此，則將對等的字元寫入主控台。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於 0 或大於或等於 <paramref name="pattern" /> 中的字元數。
